resources.string: Enter Your Registered Phone Number and Email Address Below:
Q1. How do I make a Order?
A1. Its a piece of cake once you have found your preferred restaurant simply select food items to order, and click "Place Order". Voila! Your order is now placed
Q2. How do I reset my Account Password
A2. If you forgot your password, you can easily rest it by a OTP send to your registered email address. Simple click forgot password on Login Screen and Follow the steps on upcoming screens
Q3. How long will it take for my Order to get Delivered

A3. Based on the proximity of the restaurant you are ordering from and the traffic to your location, this can typically take anywhere from 15 min to 40 min. Kindly call the restaurant to enquiry about the order
Q4.I can not find my restaurant on the app
A4. We are constantly adding more partners. If you restaurant is not in the app, we are sorry but we currently do not supply from the restaurant.
Q5. How can I check my previous orders?
A5. You can go to the Order History menu from Navigation Drawer. You will see all your previous orders and their details.
